item.title: CVE-2022-3181|2024-08-03T01:00:10.554Z -- trihedral -- vtscada
item.description: An Improper Input Validation vulnerability exists in Trihedral VTScada version 12.0.38 and prior.Â A specifically malformed HTTP request could cause the affected VTScada to crash. Both local area network (LAN)-only and internet facing systems are affected.
